An <xref:System.IServiceProvider> through which editing services may be obtained.

Docs.summary: Edits the given object value using the editor style provided by the <xref:System.Drawing.Design.ContentAlignmentEditor.GetEditStyle%2A> method.
Docs.returns: The new value of the object. If the value of the object has not changed, this should return the same object it was passed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A service provider is provided so that any required editing services can be obtained.
